modName: Request Bard To Take A Break
summary: Allows you to ask bards to take a break when they are performing a song (both instrumental and vocal songs).
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/hXQSy.png[/img][/url][/center]

==Description==
A small mod which allows you to ask a bard to take a break when he or she is playing a song.
If the bard is not performing, you will not see the option to ask for the bard to take a break.

==What does it do?==
This mod utilizes existing functionality made by Bethesda. In the vanilla game, you could ask bards to take a break if they played the 3 drinking songs, but if they were simply playing an instrumental song, you did not have the option to ask them to take a break. In addition, the request for them to take a break was hidden inside the "Can I make a request?" branch, making it a little known feature. This mod makes the "Can you take a break?" request a top level branch and makes it appear if the bard is performing any song, including instrumentals (exception being the wedding songs).


==Compatibility==
Should work with all bards, including custom bards.

==Incompatibility==
None known.
